review:
This is our first time ever with Cloud nine hospital and it's doctor.

Having recently moved to Bangalore, we have very little knowledge about whereabouts in this new city. We desperately needed to find a paediatrician for my baby in a span of two weeks as his immunization was due this week. We were referred to Dr. Srinath by my husband's aunt's family who live in the same area where the hospital is located.

Upon entering the doctor's chamber, he greeted us with a great smile. The doctor made us feel comfortable and asked us if we had any concerns regarding the baby. He made sure that when we left we had nothing more to ask of him.

We are happy with the services provided by him.

I have been visiting Dr.Srinath from  more than 8 years. My both kids are treated for all kind of illness by him. He is a cool composed doctor, doesn't advice hospitalization, he tries to treat any severe illness with simple medicines without prescribing antibiotics unless really required. So, sometimes it takes long for the kid to get cured, but surely the kid gets cured safely without side-effects. Safe hands

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very warm and friendly, and patiently answered all my queries. He also administered the vaccine for my 2 year old quite painlessly, as I could observe from the reaction of my son after the same.  Overall, it was a comfortable and pleasant environment, which makes the kids and the parents feel at ease.

My son is 2 years and is sensitive to climate change and ends up with sever cold and wheezing, every time i had to get him admitted to the hospital. But things changed after I met Dr Srinath who understood my sons condition and diagnosed him accordingly. I am very thankful to Dr Srinath and would definitely recommend.

We are visiting doctor srinath for my daughter since 4+ years, * **** ***** ****** *** ***** *** ***** Very patient, very understanding and main thing never suggests unnecessary anti biotics. available on call for any emergency. We are lucky have such pediatrician for our daughter.

My grandson is 2.5 years having cold & cough but no relief even after 5 days treatment. Congratulation deteriorated with more frequent coughing & sputum in throat. He was given only relent syrup. Child could not sleep whole night & condition is worse. He was also prescribed tulsi, honey & turmeric? Can a child take this?
Highly dissatisfied with his treatment.

We have been visiting Dr. Srinath for past 11 years from the time our daughter was born. I must say he is definitely one of the finest Paediatricians around. For both our children, we have faced multiple issues with High fever, stomach aches etc. Never has he recommended to hospitalize thus far. Moreover, he does recommend the age old home remedies like Curd Rice, Idli etc.

I definitely recommend Dr. Srinath to all my friends.

Dr. Srinath is one of excellent doctors I have seen in my life. Once my kid was having high fever (around 102); he handled perfectly without giving any antibiotics. Main thing is;  he will not misguide and not even tell something so that we will get scared. He is very cool and will give nice explanations/answers to our questions and clears all the doubts which we will have in our mind.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is an amazing child doctor, with great patience and almost care, he always ensure to understand the child problem than just giving medicine, many times he decline to prescribe instead suggested natural healing and immunity builyprocess
Really nice very humble. I m satisfied with my experience and would recommend. Wait time is also minimal

review: Very friendly doctor with loads of patience.. explains in detail regarding all th queries tat a new mom has.. also makes sure tat th doubts are cleared. I recommend Dr Srinath to all my friends..
Very friendly doctor.  An apt example of pediatrician who knows how to handle a kid and at the same time builds in confidence among parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have been consulting him from day one for our daughter. He’s very patient and practical, does not insist on unnecessary medication. ******* *** ** *** **** ******* ** **** **** Would recommend him to all parents.

review: Dr. Advised to reduce the number medicine given to my child which made our and my child's life easier.

review:
He is more friendly with children and he has lots of patience to listen the problem.
He also recommended some food habits to children. My daughter is week he recommended some food to improve immunity. He won't give antibiotics

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very experienced doctor. Conservative approach. The diagnosis is on spot always. Highly recommended to all parents.

Dr.Srinath is very professional and precise in diagnosis.  Like a dream of every parent, he prescribes anti biotic only when needed which helps kids have their immune build naturally. Very caring and passionate about his work
Excellent Doctor. I was misled some years back to a different doctor. The condition of my child worsened. Went back to Dr.Srinath and my child's health was back to normal within no time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I know Dr. Srinath from 20 years now, We used to go to him for both of my sons medical needs. Very nice doctor and his medicines are most safe . He is very cool and very quick in diagnosing the problems.

We feel very safe and assured when we go to him. My elder son is 20 yrs now and younger one is 10 yrs.

I highly recommend Dr. Srinath

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Though we were little late..... Doctor who was going out came back and attended to us....we were really very happy ,.......he was always smiling and never angry with us for coming little late....and gave good suggestions for my grandson's health........gave a very patient hearing to all our queries and replied to our satisfaction.... Thank you Sir
